main event: A UFO sighting was reported on 10/04/55 over the Atlantic Ocean, where an object was observed for 15 minutes before it blew up and disintegrated.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 15 minutes and involved a single object,The object displayed high speed and then came to a slow stop at low altitude,It blew up and disintegrated without producing any smoke trail,No sound was heard during the observation,An investigator suggested it was a routine case with a probable conventional source.
